mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDERS_QTY * b.BOOK_PRICE , O.ORDERS_DATE , date_format(O.ORDERS_DATE,'%m-%d %h:%i') "ORDERS_DATE" , O.ORDERS_NO , M.MEM_UID , B.BOOK_NO , B.BOOK_NM , B.BOOK_IMG , O.ORDERS_QTY , o.orders_status FROM `ORDERS` O JOIN BOOK B ON O.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON O.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET ORDERS_STATUS = #{orders_status} WHERE ORDERS_NO=#{orders_no}
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDERS_DATE , O.ORDERS_NO , M.MEM_UID , B.BOOK_NO , B.BOOK_NM , O.ORDERS_QTY , O.ORDERS_STATUS FROM ORDERS O JOIN BOOK B ON O.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON O.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO where o.orders_no = #{orders_no}
